query:
SELECT id, task_id, title, start_time, end_time, duration, audio_url, created_at 
FROM podcast_highlights 
ORDER BY created_at DESC 
LIMIT 3;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user LtHxqrZriiUHME1.0a62a726ab17 --database kf362K9uEYqJammqLrrUaT --execute SELECT id, task_id, title, start_time, end_time, duration, audio_url, created_at 
FROM podcast_highlights 
ORDER BY created_at DESC 
LIMIT 3;
